required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluating the Treatment in the MZEB Aachen
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluating the Treatment in the the Center for Disabled People in Aachen (MZEB Aachen) - a Registry on Patients With Severe Disabilities

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of patient characteristics, involved physicians and therapists as well as therapies in a German University Center for the Treatment of patients with intellectual disabilities and severe multiple disability (MZEB Aachen)

detailed_description.textblock: In the MZEB Aachen, since 11/2018 patients with intellectual disabilities and/or severe multiple disabilities are diagnosed, treated and accompanied for many years in a multidisciplinary setting with physicians, nurses, physiotherapists, ergo therapists, speech therapists and Support by social workers. MZEBs are considered to have a pilot function in the health care system, cooperating with therapists and physicians in the surroundings. This concept is established as a new concept in Germany in order to optimise health care for patients with disabilities. Thus we want to investigate patient characteristics, diagnoses, involved physicians and therapists as well as proposed therapies and disease progress in this center.

primary_outcome.measure: change in number of therapy sessions
primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and after one year treatment
primary_outcome.description: change in the number of therapy sessions per month

primary_outcome.time_frame: baseline and after one year treatment
primary_outcome.description: Change in percentage of definite diagnoses

intervention.description: there ist no Intervention but our standart Treatment in the center

study_pop.textblock: Mixed Population of People with intellectual and severe multiple disability who need this care in this center

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- intellectual disability and/or severe multiple disability (disability degree GdB at least 70 and at least one noticeable sign
- willing to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- housed in an Institution and/or prison

patient_data.ipd_description: All relevant results will be shared
